name: Aquaphor Baby Healing Ointment (14 Oz) + 3-in-1 Diaper Rash Cream (3.5 Oz), Hypoallergenic and Fragrance Free Skin Care Set for Babies
short_description: GENTLE CARE FOR BABY: Use Aquaphor Baby Healing Ointment with Petrolatum (a skin protectant) to provide extra gentle care for your baby's tender and delicate skin by applying it to dry, irritated and chapped skin from teething, drool rash and more
MULTIPURPOSE OINTMENT: Also use Ointment as a preventative diaper rash cream and apply with every diaper change to protect the skin from wetness, acidity and chafing to help avoid diaper rashes
DIAPER RASH CREAM: If the diaper area gets irritated, use Aquaphor Baby Diaper Rash Cream to soothe and treat mild to moderate diaper rash flare-ups

SOOTHING FORMULA: Aquaphor Baby Diaper Rash Cream is formulated with Zinc Oxide (a skin protectant) to protect baby's delicate skin and effectively treat diaper rash—preservative and fragrance free, soothing for dry, sensitive skin

COLOR VARIATIONS: Ointment color variations occur due to the nature of the ingredients in the product, but do not affect product safety and performance—Aquaphor Healing Ointment is a white translucent to light yellow ointment
INCLUDES: One (1) 14 ounce jar of Aquaphor Baby Healing Ointment Advanced Therapy Skin Protectant and one (1) 3.5 ounce tube of Aquaphor Baby 3-in-1 Diaper Rash Cream
product_description: Aquaphor Baby Skin Care and Diaper Rash Set comes with 14 oz Aquaphor Baby Healing Ointment and 3.5 oz Diaper Rash Cream. This pack gives you everything you need for baby’s skin care essentials. Both items are specifically formulated to suit the sensitive skin of babies. Aquaphor Baby Healing Ointment is a multi-purpose solution for your baby's many skincare needs. This ointment is great for soothing dry, chapped or cracked skin and helps prevent chafing. It nourishes and protects baby's skin to enhance healing from skin irritations such as chapped skin from teething and drool rash. Use Aquaphor Ointment as a preventative diaper rash cream and apply with every diaper change to protect the skin from wetness, acidity and chafing to help avoid rashes. Aquaphor Baby Ointment is a white translucent to light yellow ointment. Color variations occur due to the nature of the ingredients in the product, but do not affect product safety and performance. If the diaper area does get irritated, use soothing Aquaphor Baby Diaper Rash Cream to soothe and treat mild to moderate diaper rash flare-ups. Formulated with Zinc Oxide and Panthenol, this diaper rash treatment creates an effective barrier and protects your baby’s skin all night long. The light cream goes on gently, cleans off easy.

This diaper rash ointment nourishes and reconditions skin naturally with shea butter, lavender oil and jojoba seed oil while creating an emollient layer to absorb wetness leaving babys skin soft, dry, and smooth. Pediatrician-tested and safe for your babys delicate skin. This ointment is formulated with no parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS and is not tested on animals. Nurture and protect your babys skin naturally with Burts Bees Baby Bee.

short_description: SOOTHES, PROTECTS, & RELIEVES: Unlike other lotions and creams, A+D Overnight Healing Rash Ointment contains Vitamin A & Vitamin D to help heal and moisturize skin and repair and rejuvenate aggravated skin to help your baby wake up with happier skin

RELIEVES IRRITATED SKIN OVERNIGHT: Designed to heal overnight. Helps relieve the discomfort of chapped, chafed, and cracked skin so your baby can sleep through the night and wake up in comfort. 93% of parents saw noticeably improved skin in the morning

PEDIATRICIAN RECOMMENDED DIAPER RASH OINTMENT: A+D Ointment is pediatrician recommended containing Vitamins A+D, colloidal oatmeal, & lavender. Clinically shown to improve redness, dryness, itching, diaper rash, and irritated skin. Free of parabens, dyes, and phthalates

SOOTHING & VERSATILE: This gentle formula is smooth and spreads evenly. Not just for babies with sore bottoms, this ointment can also be used for bums, cheeks, legs, neck, knees, hands, elbows, and feet

TRUSTED FOR 80 YEARS: For over 80 years, A+D vitamin enriched formula has been trusted & endorsed by moms, dads, pediatricians, and dermatologists to heal the most sensitive skin. A+D is here to provide your family with more happy skin days
product_description: If you have an infant or toddler, you probably know what diaper rash looks like. Red, bumpy, cracked skin is no fun for babies or their parents! A+D Oatmeal & Lavender Ointment for diaper rash is a smart addition to your collection of baby skincare products and healing skin ointments. Safe to use at every diaper change, it works overnight to promote healing. It is also useful as a healing skin ointment for bums, elbow, knees and other areas, providing soothing relief to chapped and cracked skin.

name: Boudreaux's Butt Paste Maximum Strength Diaper Rash Cream, Diaper Cream for Baby, Fast Relief & Overnight Protection for Moderate to More Irritated Rash, Pediatrician-Recommended, 2 oz & 14 oz
short_description: Relieves discomfort fast: This Maximum Strength Boudreaux's Butt Paste diaper cream helps treat and prevent diaper rash, providing fast relief and instantly protecting irritated skin with first use; this product is FSA & HSA eligible in the USA

Powerful, protective formula: With more than 2x the rash-fighting ingredient than our Original Butt Paste Ointment, this 40% zinc oxide cream is clinically-tested, hypoallergenic and fragrance-free; this formula is free from parabens, preservatives, dyes and talc

Easy application: Change soiled diaper immediately, cleanse diaper area, allow to dry and apply diaper rash ointment liberally; use as needed, especially when exposed to wet diapers for a prolonged period, such as bedtime

Safe for use at every diaper change: Our extra strength baby rash cream is perfect for the diaper bag and the changing table; this protective diaper rash ointment is easy to take on the go, making it safe for every diaper change
Pediatrician-recommended brand: At Boudreaux's, our baby essentials have been trusted for over 40 years by pediatricians and parents to help protect irritated skin and kick rash fast
product_description: Developed by a pharmacist and father of four, Boudreaux's Butt Paste Brand has been trusted for over 40 years by pediatricians and parents to help treat and prevent diaper rash. This maximum strength diaper rash cream is a thick, cream-like protective diaper rash ointment with 40% Zinc Oxide. Boudreaux's Butt Paste Maximum Strength provides overnight protection, starts to soothe on contact, seals out moisture and helps keep baby’s boo-tay dry. Our maximum strength formula is free from dyes, preservatives, parabens and talc. To apply, change soiled diaper immediately, cleanse diaper area, allow to dry and apply diaper rash ointment liberally. Use this diaper cream as needed, especially when exposed to wet diapers for a prolonged period, such as bedtime. Our baby rash cream is perfect for the diaper bag and the changing table, making it easy to take on the go and safe for every diaper change.

product_description: Aquaphor Baby Diaper Rash Paste provides immediate soothing relief in just one application and protects your baby's delicate skin from diaper rash. Enriched with natural Shea Butter, this creamy, non-sticky, rich cream formula is gentle to apply and easy to clean off. Compared to Aquaphor Baby Rash Cream, the Diaper Rash Paste is formulated with maximum strength 40% Zinc Oxide. This is the strongest formula without a prescription that intensively treats diaper rash and creates a barrier to protect your baby's irritated skin. Best used on moderate to troublesome diaper rash, as well as for diaper rash flare-ups. It relieves discomfort for your little one in one application and protects skin all night long. To Use: apply Paste with every diaper change. Use as often as needed, especially with prolonged exposure to wet diapers. For everyday maintenance to prevent diaper rash, check out Aquaphor Baby Healing Ointment. Help restore and soothe baby’s delicate skin with Aquaphor Baby products.
